item.title: Transparent LAN Service for WAN Bandwidth
item.description:
With the increasing trend of businesses expanding beyond a single location, the demand for reliable wide-area connectivity is on the rise. This is particularly relevant for companies with branches across the country and medical facilities spread over large regions. While traditional telecommunications services have connected multiple locations, newer solutions now allow your local area network (LAN) to cover an entire metropolitan area or even span multiple states. One such solution is known as transparent LAN service, which effectively combines multiple separate LANs into a single, unified network...
